meanings.definition: A British coin worth half of a penny.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny halfpence on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: In the past, people used halfpence to buy small items.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel traded acorns for a colorful halfpence.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a halfpence, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The halfpence gleamed in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.sent1: My collection of halfpence includes coins from different eras.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper counted the halfpence carefully before closing.
meanings.sent3: The children played a game using halfpence as pretend treasure.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled in the night sky like scattered halfpence.
meanings.sent5: The sound of halfpence jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.
